name: Shipped
description: Challenge your friends in a naval battle of steering, pushing and shooting. Keep your ship on-screen and avoid crashing with land to survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or Nvidia Geforce 940MX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 240 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card Additional Notes: Keyboard or Gamepad
